text: Configured Oracle CPQ for multiple product lines, including guided selling, approval workflows, and custom BML rules

Assisted with REST API connections between CPQ and ERP for pricing, approvals, and order submissions

Wrote Python and SQL scripts to support pricing analysis, quote validation, and margin reporting
Developed Excel tools and Power Query dashboards to automate quote tracking and sales KPIs
Participated in Agile sprints using Jira and Azure DevOps for enhancement tracking and UAT
Provided documentation and light user support for 200+ global users in sales and operations teams
Collaborated with sales, IT, and finance stakeholders to align system functionality with business needs
Built and maintained REST API integrations across Oracle CPQ, Salesforce CRM, and ERP systems for real-time data synchronization

Built task management application with React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and JWT authentication. Deployed on AWS EC2 with Docker
Developed React frontend integrated with OpenWeatherMap API, highlighting data fetching and presentation skills
Designed and implemented a web-based inventory management system to enable real-time stock tracking and order processing
Built a RESTful API for real-time integration with supplier databases, reducing order fulfillment times by 30%
Created an API monitoring tool to track system health, latency, and performance of critical endpoints
Built a custom alerting system that triggers notifications based on predefined thresholds, improving response times to API issues by 40%
Developed an automation tool to streamline the process of generating quotes within Oracle CPQ, reducing generation time by 40%
Implemented data validation and error-checking mechanisms, ensuring 100% accuracy in generated quotes
Led the tool deployment across three business units, achieving widespread adoption and a 25% boost in productivity
